Don't moan at me for leeching, i'm just trying to learn how to code! :)

item.title: How to change these
item.dc:creator: @Mutant138 Mutant138
item.description:
@Mutant138 wrote:

ok very simple… firstly to change the welcome to frozen tyme… go into your client folder… and search for client.java … press ctrl+F and search for “welcome to” change it to whatever you want…

now to change the message when u log in… go into your source folder… search for client.java, and ctrl+F then search for “Welcome to” look for one which looks like this ("Alert##Welcome to frozen tyme…

once you’ve finished editing it you need to copile both client and source folders…
hope i’ve helped
-Mutant

Read full topic
